com.analog.lyric.dimple.solvers.lp

Interface IntegerEquation.TermIterator

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LPFactorMarginalConstraint.TermIterator, LPVariableConstraint.TermIterator, MatlabConstraintTermIterator
    Enclosing class:
    IntegerEquation

    public static interface IntegerEquation.TermIterator
    Iterates over the terms of the linear equation.

    Usage: 

        while (iterator.advance())
    {
        int v = iterator.getVariable();
        int c = iterator.getCoefficient();
        ...
    }

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean advance()
      Advances the iterator to the next variable/coefficient pair.
      int getCoefficient() 
      int getVariable() 

    • Method Detail

      • advance

        boolean advance()
        Advances the iterator to the next variable/coefficient pair. You must invoke this at least once before accessing getVariable() or getCoefficient().
        Returns:
        false if there are no more terms, in which case the variable and coefficient values are not defined.

      • getVariable

        int getVariable()
        Returns:
        variable identifier for current term. Undefined if advance() was not invoked or returned false.

      • getCoefficient

        int getCoefficient()
        Returns:
        coefficient value for current term. Undefined if advance() was not invoked or returned false.
